snippet: A man fatally shot two women in an Elkhart grocery and was waving a gun at a kneeling store manager when police officers arrived and killed him, the authorities said Thursday.
abstract: Police in Elkhart, Ind, shoot and kill gunman Shawn W Bair after he opens fire at a grocery store, fatally shooting two women and waving a gun at a kneeling store manager when authorities arrive on the scene.
lead_paragraph: A man fatally shot two women in an Elkhart grocery and was waving a gun at a kneeling store manager when police officers arrived and killed him, the authorities said Thursday.

headline.main: Indiana: Police Kill Suspect in Fatal Shootings at Store
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Police Kill Suspect in Fatal Shootings at Store
